API Collection# Setting Policies (Legacy)

## [Topics](/documentation/WebKit/setting-policies-legacy#topics)

### [Setting Policies (Legacy)](/documentation/WebKit/setting-policies-legacy#Setting-Policies-Legacy)

[`protocol WebPolicyDecisionListener`](/documentation/webkit/webpolicydecisionlistener)This protocol enables [`WebView`](/documentation/webkit/webview-swift.class) policy delegates to communicate with listener objects. A listener object conforming to this protocol is passed as one of the arguments to web view policy delegate methods.Deprecated[`protocol WebPolicyDelegate`](/documentation/webkit/webpolicydelegate)Deprecated## [See Also](/documentation/WebKit/setting-policies-legacy#see-also)
